question_stem:
2. ( 10 p oints ) A data set on house selling price in the US w as randomly collected. A
mo del that helps to predict the selling price of a house using other v ariables is to b e tted.
The description of v ariables in the data set is giv en b elo w.
V ariable Description
price house's price in thousand US dollars
size house's size in square feet (sqft)
bedrooms n um b er of b edro oms
garage 1 = with garage; 0 = no garage
Figure 1: Histogram of price (left) and scatter plot of price against size (righ t)
(a) A histogram of the house's price and a scatter plot of the house's price against house's
size are giv en in Figure 1. Commen t if it is suitable to t a linear regression mo del
for price ?
(b) A linear mo del, called M, is tted. The summary output of mo del M is giv en in
Figure 2 (next page).
W rite do wn the tted equation of mo del M.
Rep ort the co ecien t of the v ariable garage in mo del M and in terpret it.
(c) Commen t on the go o dness of t of mo del M.
(d) The information of a new house is giv en b elo w. Using mo del M, calculate the pre-
dicted price of this house.
size = 1500 sqft, bedrooms = 3, garage = 1
4
DSA1101
Figure 2: Summary output of mo del M
5
DSA1101
